amendment.description: To extend the authority for Federal contractors to reimburse employees unable to perform work due to the COVID-19 pandemic from March 31, 2021, to September 30, 2021.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1391 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 6. Record Vote Number: 109.

action.text: Amendment SA 1391 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 891. (consideration: CR S1261; text: CR S1261) To extend the authority for Federal contractors to reimburse employees unable to perform work due to the COVID-19 pandemic from March 31, 2021, to September 30, 2021.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1391 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 6. Record Vote Number: 109.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1391 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 93 - 6. Record Vote Number: 109.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1391 proposed by Senator Warner to Amendment SA 891.
